commit message:
Sync restore-checkbox with previous set state
(cherry picked from commit 264ede7)

Handle preferences write in background using apply()
(cherry picked from commit 48ee3b4)
Don't make pins automatically persistent, if priority MIN is set

Merge pull request #6 from Ezelty/Ezelty-patch-1

Fixed french translation
Target latest Android Version and update build-tools
Move all sharedPreferences usage to PreferencesHandler class
Cache pins by serializing and saving them to SharedPreferences
Return as list for easier access
Fix invalid integer caused by java.lang.NumberFormatException
Cleanup package; move receiver into their own package
Move changelog to its own file
Move changelog into the docs directory
Simplify the advanced-view switch using a List<View> and foreach loop
No need to cache the notification id
Simplify the if title empty check using the String.isEmpty() method
Remove usage of the deprecated .getColor() api
No need to log every onClick view id
